import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Layout from '../components/Layout'; const HomePage = () => { const [keyword, setKeyword] = useState(''); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSearch = () => { if (keyword.trim()) { navigate(`/search?query=${encodeURIComponent(keyword.trim())}`); } }; return ( {/* Layout 적용 시작 */}
setKeyword(e.target.value)} className="w-full bg-[#2A2A2A] border-0 rounded-button pl-10 pr-4 py-2 text-white placeholder-gray-400 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-custom" />
